11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"I prayed behind the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), Abu Bakr, Umar and Uthman, may Allah be pleased with them, and I did not hear any of them say out loud: In the Name of Allah, The Most Gracious, The Most Merciful

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الْجَهْرِ بِـ { بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ }
chapter.eng-name: Not saying "In the Name of Allah, The Most Gracious, The Most Merciful" Aloud
